|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS32 |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV640EBTI-70G; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM5325E;BCM5325EKQMG, RG1020 P11, 976768 1A; |cm_down_c = |cm_up_c = |docsisver = 2.0 |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = C4:46:19 |oui = C4:46:19 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = eCos;;; |exp_if_types = Mini PCI, USB (unk. standard - slave), |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, (115200 8N1),, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, J353 |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = DOCSIS 2.0 |addchip = Direct Conversion Cable Tuner;Broadcom;BCM3421;Broadcom, BCM3421KMLG, TS1015 P10, 62757 11;1; |802dot11_protocols = bg |defaulip = 192.168.100.1 |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = XXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^[a-f0-9]{4}$ |default_ch = |manuf = Foxconn |manuf_model = U10C037 |manuf_rev = .20 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 12/09/2004 |estreldate = 01/2008 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Foxconn T60H096 |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4318;BCM4318KFBG, HD1018 P11, 973754 B5A; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "U10C037" and "REV.0 GP" is silkscreened on the board. :One particular production model board is using a mix of '''nichicon''' :and '''Chemi-Con''' branded radial capacitors. This device is using... *a '''Broadcom''' BCM3361 (BCM3361KPBG) Cable Modem SoC **+ [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Cable/Cable-Modem-Solutions/BCM3421 BCM3421 (BCM3421KML) cable tuner] *an 8MB Flash chip ('''Macronix''' MX29LV640EBTI-70G) *an RAM chip of unknown size and part (it's under a soldered :on shield which I do not currently feel like removing) *a '''Foxconn''' T60H096 wireless module (BCM4318) *a '''Broadcom''' BCM5325E (BCM5325EKQMG) FE Switch The default SSID for the device (or at the very least, some devices) :appears to be the last two octets of the Cable RF MAC address :(it's on the label) w/ lower case characters. ==Links of Interest== :[http://www.wavebroadband.com/support/internet/docs/Ambit-Cable-Modem-User-Guide.pdf User Guide on ''Wavebroadband''] :Rev: 1.03, dated 2013-01-03 ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 
1 (GND)
  (TxD)
  (...)
  (RxD)
  (GND) J353
{{/Serial info}} [[Category:English Documentation]]
